short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify Apps Recommendations and installer with different suggestions like chat, popup, lucky wheel, reviews, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Apps marketplace includes a lot of apps, our Shopify Apps Recommendation extension helps you with selected apps that will improve your Shopify website store. 

The Shopify Apps Recommendation includes over 30 different types of apps with installation wizards so you can configure the apps right from this chrome extension to make them appear on your website.

Here is a list of the Shopify Apps which are included in this extension:

Communication & Chat Apps:
The Shopify Apps Recommendation includes the option to integrate different type of  chat apps so customers can contact you using Whatsapp, Fcaebook Messenger, Telegram, Viber, Line and more. 

The extension includes apps that will help you to improve the engagement with different social media profiles so you can gain more followers in order to bring them back to your website. Here is a list of the Social Media apps which included:

* Follow Us Social media icons - Include all social media platforms
* Instagram Follow Us
* Facebook Follow Us
* TikTok Follow Us
* Twitter / X.com
* SnapChat

Popup apps:
* Simple Popup
* Exit Popup
* Popup Forms
* Countdown Popup
* Quiz Popup

More Engagement apps:
* Reviews
* Stories
* Lucky Wheel / Wheel of fortune
* Corner Ribbon
* Social Proof Sales
* FAQ
* Message Bar / Announcement Bar
* Countdown Bar 
* Urgency Deal Offer

The term 'Shopify' is a trademark of Shopify,Inc. This extension might use the official Shopify API.
